snippet: Following the Nevada caucuses, the Republican contenders appear on the Sunday shows.
abstract: Following the Nevada caucuses, the Republican contenders appear on the Sunday shows.
lead_paragraph: Following the Nevada caucuses on Saturday, the contenders for the Republican presidential nomination will stop by the Sunday shows. Newt Gingrich makes appearances on NBC's "Meet the Press" and CBS's "Face the Nation," while Rick Santorum joins "Fox News Sunday" and Representative Ron Paul of Texas is on ABC's "This Week." And after his victory in the Florida primary, Mitt Romney will be featured on Telemundo's "Enfoque."
